refresh.error: Failed to fetch custom models. {{error, default='Please try again'}}.

confirmation.title: Confirm deletion
confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} model? This action is irreversible.

notification.error: Failed to delete model. Please try again.

confirmation.title: Confirm deployment
confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to deploy {{name}} model?

confirmation.title: Undeploy model
confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to undeploy {{name}}?

modelName.label: Model name
modelName.placeholder: Provide a name for the model
modelName.description: The name must be unique and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, periods, and dashes.
modelName.nonUniqueNameError: Another model with the same name already exists
modelName.invalidCharactersError: Model name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, periods, and dashes

modelDescription.label: Model description
modelDescription.placeholder: Provide a description for the model

list.title: AIM Catalog
list.description: Ready-to-deploy open source models created by the worldwide AI community. You can easily deploy these models as inference services.

confirmation.title: Undeploy model
confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to undeploy model {{name}}?

modal.title: Connect to model
modal.externalUrl: External URL (accessible from outside the cluster)
modal.internalUrl: Internal URL (accessible only within the cluster)
modal.codeExample: Use this snippet to connect to the model.

notifications.downloadError: Failed to download {{modelName}} model. Please try again.
notifications.fetchError: Failed to fetch AIM Catalog. {{error, default='Please try again'}}.
notifications.fetchSecretsError: Failed to fetch secrets. {{error, default='Please try again'}}.
notifications.deleteError: Failed to undeploy AIM. Please try again.

tooltips.hfTokenRequired: This model requires a Hugging Face token for deployment

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: Enter a display name for the token

validation.selectTokenOrProvideNameAndToken: Please select an existing token or provide both name and token
validation.nameRequired: Name is required when entering a new token
validation.invalidSecretName: The secret name must be lowercase alphanumeric characters, '-' or '.', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character
validation.tokenRequired: Token is required when entering a new token
validation.invalidTokenFormat: Please enter a valid Hugging Face token (starts with 'hf_')

notifications.secretCreated: Hugging Face token secret '{{name}}' created successfully
notifications.secretCreateError: Failed to create Hugging Face token secret: {{error}}
notifications.downloadStarted: Model download started with Hugging Face token
notifications.invalidSecretResponse: Failed to create secret: Invalid response from server
notifications.noTokenSelected: No Hugging Face token selected or created

huggingFaceToken.title: Hugging Face authentication
huggingFaceToken.description: This model requires a Hugging Face token for deployment. Please provide a valid token to proceed with the deployment.
huggingFaceToken.label: Hugging Face token

metric.title: Performance metric
metric.label: Performance metric
metric.description:
Metric selects the optimization goal.
- latency: prioritize low end-to-end latency
- throughput: prioritize sustained requests/second

If not specified AIM will default to the most appropriate metric based on the model and hardware.

experimentalDeployment.title: Unoptimized deployment
experimentalDeployment.label: Allow
experimentalDeployment.description: Enabling this option will include all available deployment configurations and might result in subpar performance.
